hero_title: Embassy of the Republic of Senegal in Rwanda
ambassador_message: I warmly welcome you to the official website of the Embassy of the Republic of Senegal in Rwanda.

hero_section.title: Discover Senegal
hero_section.description: A country of culture, innovation, sport, and international cooperation, united with Rwanda through strong bilateral relations.
